pkgmetadata.longdescription: Efficient Computation and Testing of the Bergsma-Dassios Sign Covariance // Computes the t* statistic corresponding to the tau* population coefficient introduced by Bergsma and Dassios (2014) DOI:10.3150/13-BEJ514 and does so in O(n^2) time following the algorithm of Heller and Heller (2016) arXiv:1605.08732 building off of the work of Weihs, Drton, and Leung (2016) DOI:10.1007/s00180-015-0639-x. Also allows for independence testing using the asymptotic distribution of t* as described by Nandy, Weihs, and Drton (2016) arXiv:1602.04387.
